attributes.action: Ask parliament to debate the deaths and adverse reactions of covid 19 vaccines
attributes.additional_details: As the uk government move to push the covid 19 vaccinations on the children of our population there needs to be a discussion on the data published on the uk’s very own yellow card reporting system. To date there have been over 1600 deaths and over 1.5 million adverse reactions reported. These adverse reactions range from myocarditis, pericarditis, blood clotting abnormalities, neurological injury such as transverse myelitis, Bell’s palsy, guillian-barre syndrome and many more.
attributes.background: Ask parliament to debate the number of deaths and adverse reactions caused by the covid 19 vaccination programme as per the MHRA yellow card reporting scheme.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, such as changing a policy or decision. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
